website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option for a beginner or basic set of color pencils from the industry leader in everyday coloring supplies.
pros: Thick, soft 3.3 mm cores that don't shred or break under pressure or during sharpening
Set includes classic, foundational colors diverse enough for the everyday coloring enthusiast
cons: Limited color selection, so eventually you'll need to replace or upgrade to a more expansive set

customer_reviews.title: Neater Than Markers and Less Fragile than Crayons
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks ago I bought my 2 1/2 year old some Crayola markers because I knew she would love them. They are washable right? What a mess. Yes they cleaned up but she is just not ready for markers. We ordered these pencils because her crayons were starting to look pretty beat up. Crayons can just be too fragile for a toddler. She was frequently breaking them in half. These pencils have great vibrant color. They are very durable and easy for a 2 1/2 year old to hold. They should last years at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: Les Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I buy these small packages of colored pencils to add to my thousand pencils because i color in adult coloring books and always run out of reds and greens. This way i dont get 70 other colors ive got
customer_reviews.author: nlm1957

customer_reviews.title: weird...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2- 2 packs of Colored pencils, and got exactly what I ordered... except with a thumb-sized bottle of "ROC 'Multi Correxion' 5 in 1 Chest, Neck and Face Cream"
customer_reviews.author: A happy customer

customer_reviews.title: I got ONE for the price of TWO
customer_reviews.text: Product listing says 2. It only came with one pack, that is expensive for ONE pack. I contacted the seller and they didn't respond or try to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Angel VanBlargan

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Description
customer_reviews.text: The picture as well as the description show a pack of regular colored pencils. What I received was mini colored pencils and so now not only am out the pencils since we need regular sized ones, but they also cost over $4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keys

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sharpen. The colors aren't too bright so you have to push kinda hard to make darker lines. They don't break easily tho.
customer_reviews.author: Jrose27

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a 2-pack of pencils
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 2-pack of pencils, which comes in handy when my son inevitably needs extra supplies at school. His supply list requests Crayola brand specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pair with a sketch book for a nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: A classic gift when paired with a sketch book or activity book. It is nice to know that children still are open to a low-tech activity!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good pencils.
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids who are just starting off to draw and don't need a million different shades of the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good product and she loved them
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved them but I found Same thing for .50 cents a pack at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Sue Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great Colorful Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this pack yet, but I have used Crayola pencils in the past and have always enjoyed their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order more than one packet of time!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packs of two and I only got one pack of two so I got to pay double. I highly doubt that I’ll get my other pack of two
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great pencils for adult coloring books. I didn't realize it was a 2 pack. Bonus
customer_reviews.author: Sktshtr

customer_reviews.title: Always loved CRAYOLA
customer_reviews.text: Used this brand since I was a child; and wouldn’t EVER buy anything of lesser quality
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Monsoon

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring pencils
customer_reviews.text: Great coloring pencils! I thought I ordered just one but it was a 2 pack of them. My kids will have lots of coloring and drawing to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colored Pencils
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for school supplies for kids. Extremely convenient! Is exactly what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: ANTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well the actual product was fine, but inside of the sealed package was ants. It was cover with almost 50 ants. I mean, I am allergic to certain types of insects, and it could have been bad. I checked all around my mailbox there where no ants. I also had two other packages in there with no ants. This was not cool to open in the middle of my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: josh cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the Classroom!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter who is a new elementary teacher. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Britton

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the description fool you!
customer_reviews.text: The item is described as "Pack of 2" but I only received one box. You can see where there was clear packing tape cut (assuming for the removal of the other box).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy! Since they came in twin packs I was able to double my care packages!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Logue

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING!
customer_reviews.text: Only received ONE of the supposed TWO packages of colored pencils. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Keep young adults busy 😃
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 25 year old granddaughter and she love them
customer_reviews.author: PeggyT

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to get two packs of colored pencils for my son's school supplies instead I received two packs of markers. I do not need markers! They are non refundable! so now I have to go to the store and spend more money you get the supplies I should already have. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Belisle

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors....
customer_reviews.text: Crayola's products are so durable and the colors are great. Kids love them some Crayola.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These pencils were all short. Not what I ordered or as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for multiple packs. Buying for three kids so value is good. They’re Crayola so they’re good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris1989

product_meta.title: Crayola 68-4012 Colored Pencils, 12-Count, Pack of 2, Assorted Colors
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 2Indications: Crayola colored non-toxic pencils, longandnbsp; it comes pre-sharpened and ready for all of your coloring needs. This item is a school supply standard. These pencils are great for detailed coloring. The selection consists of 12 vivid colors: Red, red-orange, Orange, Yellow, yellow-green, Green, sky blue, blue, Violet, light Brown, brown and black. Each pencil measures 7 long sharpened and is made from strong reforested wood. These pencils are recommended for children ages 8 an
feature_bullets: Art tools Made from reforested wood
